doc.field: Documents Hoffman's N-YHS presidency (1903-1912), subsequent convalescence, Executive Commitee membership (1919-1937) and further committee work, acquisitions, donations, and special event participation. Includes discussions of advances of funds to the society; oversight of facilities; establishment of Susan M. Watson binding fund; relationship and fallout with Henry Dexter as well as his bequest to N-YHS; health and deaths of prominent members and colleagues; omission of several female patrons from 1908 annual report; unspecified cataloging work following retirement; updates on Society activity from the Librarian; and the Van Rensselaer episode (or, "this season of female complaints"). Other items: blank photograph request form and 1913 meeting resolution honoring Hoffman upon his resignation.
